item.description:
Our summer of fun continues! Join us as we check out indoor skydiving at SkyVenture in Nashua. Here is more info below- it looks like an awesome experience and safe too! Please check their website for additional information.

We are a State of the Art Vertical Wind Tunnel where YOU can experience the FREEDOM OF FLIGHT! There is NO falling sensation, you just float above the trampoline floor with ease.

The indoor vertical wind tunnel is not only used by the worldâ€™s best skydivers to train in but it was also designed for the general public to experience the sport of body flight.

SkyVenture completely immerses visitors in the world of high adventure skydiving, without ever having to pack a parachute, pull a ripcord, or jump out of a perfectly good airplane. NO Experience Necessary! Virtually anyone can fly ages 3 and up.

The cost is $48. Each member is responsible for their own payment. I will make reservations for our group.

It would be great to carpool, so please indicate in your RSVP if you would like to carpool.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Indoor Skydiving at Skyventure, Nashua, NH
